name: aka Rinshu
greetingText: Well, it's a day as special as you are!❤️
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I thought of doing but jyada casual and formal ho jata..so here we go 😋
text4: It might be a little weird to say this, but the entire thing isn't mine, i know nothing about coding😭
text4Adjective: It's just i wanted to do something different so just trial and error 😭
text5Entry: I hope you like it, it's nothing cool and outstanding but chalane layak hai uk🥹🌷✨
text5Content: Well...Get back to the topic.. Happy Birthday My love!!🫣❤️✨
smiley: I'm glad you were born today, i'll forever be grateful to Mumma for bringing a sweetheart in this world🫶
bigTextPart1: Thank you for always being mine and even loving my flaws, Thank you always listening to me whenever i needed you..You mean a lot to me!🎀
bigTextPart2: Always stay healthy and fit and keep winning in life, with or without me doesn't matter, but just keep growing! Well,we are meant to end up together and no way I'm letting you go😗, since you are only person who know how crazy i can be😭
wishHeading: I love you so much Rinshu!😄❤️✨
outroText: Anddd yessss...You are finally an adultt😼..But aab mai apko tease nai kar paungi..ahh😭
replayText: But koi nai..My Bby finally turned 18!!🫣🌷✨
